TC_modal.term_1: By visiting Krystal and participating in the Guess & Win game, You are deemed to have read, understood and agreed by the Terms stated here in.
TC_modal.term_2: Krystal shall be entitled to take any form of action against User who violates the Krystal Terms of Use and/or abuses the Guess & Win game, including but is not limited to, any suspicious activities, or any attempts to circumvent these Terms.
TC_modal.term_3: Any and all decisions made by Krystal in relation to every aspect of the Guess & Win game, shall be final and conclusive. Any subsequent correspondences, protest, appeals or enquiries will not be entertained.
TC_modal.term_4: Krystal reserves the right to cancel, terminate or suspend the Guess & Win Game upon giving adequate notice.
TC_modal.term_5: Krystal reserves the right to amend, waive, suspend, terminate or interpret any portion of these Terms in its sole discretion, and at any time without prior notice. In such an event, Krystal will make reasonable efforts to notify you.
TC_modal.term_6: Payment of Prizes for any draw shall be made on such days and in such manner as shall be decided by the Company.
TC_modal.term_7: Payment of Prizes will be made in BUSD, and will be made available to claim in Krystal Rewards.
TC_modal.term_8: Any prize not claimed within thirty (30) days from the date of the Relevant Draw shall be forfeited.
TC_modal.term_9: Questions, comments and requests regarding these Terms or complaints related to the Guess & Win game are welcomed and should be addressed to
TC_modal.title: Terms & Conditions

get_ticket_modal.buy_failed: Buy ticket failed! Please try again later!
get_ticket_modal.claim_failed: Claim ticket failed! Please try again later!

info.limit_claim: You can only claim {{tickets}} tickets at a time.
info.limit_redeem: You can only redeem {{tickets}} tickets at a time.

holistic.live_stream_text: Check out the live drawing right here

part_1.description: Guess & Win is a way for Krystal users to win cash prizes by exchanging eggs for tickets.
part_1.title: What is Guess & Win?

part_2.description_1: The digits on your ticket must match the winning number in the correct order to win.
part_2.description_2: You can win by matching either the first or last few digits with the winning number. If you do not get the first or last digit correct, you will not win any prizes.

description_3.line_1: Prize brackets don’t ‘stack’. If 2 sets of numbers match, the set with the

example.example_1: The first 3 digits match, so this ticket only wins a “Match 3” prize.
example.example_2: The last 2 digits match, so this ticket wins a “Match 2” prize.
example.example_3: The first 3 digits and the last 2 digits match, so this ticket wins the highest matching numbers which is a “Match 3” prize.
example.example_4: Neither the first or last digit matched, so this ticket will not win any prize.
example.title: Here is an example

part_2.post_description_1: Prizes are allocated accordingly to the number of digits matched
part_2.post_description_2: Prizes will be equally split amongst all winners within each group.
part_2.title: Winning Criteria

part_3.description: You can earn eggs by completing the following tasks

tasks.task_1: Complete Missions and Quests: Earn eggs directly
tasks.task_2: Daily Check-In: Earn spins. Use spin to earn eggs

part_3.title: How do I earn eggs?

part_4.description: If your tickets have matched, you can claim your prizes in My Rewards page. Please allow 3 working days after each draw for the prizes to be distributed.
part_4.title: How do I claim my prize?

step_1.description: Spend 100 eggs = 1 ticket You can pick you own ticket number
step_1.title: Step 1

step_2.note: Check page for date of draw
step_2.title: Step 2

step_3.note: Once the round is over, you can check your results here. Winnings will be claimable under My Rewards in 2-3 days.
step_3.title: Step 3
